046package org.jfree.chart.needle;
047
048import java.awt.Graphics2D;
049import java.awt.Shape;
050import java.awt.geom.Line2D;
051import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
052import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
053import java.io.Serializable;
054
055/**
056 * A needle that is represented by a line.
057 */
058public class LineNeedle extends MeterNeedle
059                        implements Cloneable, Serializable {
060
061    /** For serialization. */
062    private static final long serialVersionUID = 6215321387896748945L;
063
064    /**
065     * Draws the needle.
066     *
067     * @param g2  the graphics device.
068     * @param plotArea  the plot area.
069     * @param rotate  the rotation point.
070     * @param angle  the angle.
071     */
072    @Override
073    protected void drawNeedle(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D plotArea,
074                              Point2D rotate, double angle) {
075
076        Line2D shape = new Line2D.Double();
077
078        double x = plotArea.getMinX() + (plotArea.getWidth() / 2);
079        shape.setLine(x, plotArea.getMinY(), x, plotArea.getMaxY());
080
081        Shape s = shape;
082
083        if ((rotate != null) && (angle != 0)) {
084            /// we have rotation
085            getTransform().setToRotation(angle, rotate.getX(), rotate.getY());
086            s = getTransform().createTransformedShape(s);
087        }
088
089        defaultDisplay(g2, s);
090
091    }
092
093    /**
094     * Tests another object for equality with this object.
095     *
096     * @param obj  the object to test (<code>null</code> permitted).
097     *
098     * @return A boolean.
099     */
100    @Override
101    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
102        if (obj == this) {
103            return true;
104        }
105        if (!(obj instanceof LineNeedle)) {
106            return false;
107        }
108        return super.equals(obj);
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * Returns a hash code for this instance.
113     *
114     * @return A hash code.
115     */
116    @Override
117    public int hashCode() {
118        return super.hashCode();
119    }
120
121    /**
122     * Returns a clone of this needle.
123     *
124     * @return A clone.
125     *
126     * @throws CloneNotSupportedException if the <code>LineNeedle</code>
127     *     cannot be cloned (in theory, this should not happen).
128     */
129    @Override
130    public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
131        return super.clone();
132    }
133
134}
135
